titleInfo.title: Data publication for final paper: How to accelerate green technology diffusion? (Energy Economics)

mods.abstract: This data publication contains updates of the simulations, statistical analyses and a bug-fix of the simulation model that had been made for the final publication of "How to accelerate green technology diffusion? Directed technological change in the presence of coevolving absorptive capacity" published by Energy Economics. DOI: 10.1016/j.eneco.2019.104565 It is an update of an earlier data publication (DOI: 10.4119/unibi/2932844). The use of the update and the link to the earlier version are explained in more detail in the readme.txt.
